items.sentence: Tom always behaves himself well. However, Mary does not.
Tom always makes it a rule never to ask a woman her age.
Tom and Mary are expecting their first child next month.
Tom and Mary bought their grandson a bike for Christmas.
Tom didn\'t notice that Mary was wearing a wedding ring.
Tom didn\'t seem terribly interested in learning French.
Tom didn\'t seem to care that nobody seemed to like him.
Tom didn\'t start to play the piano until he was thirty.
Tom didn\'t study at all, but he passed the test anyway.
Does an electric wheelchair require a driver\'s license?
